ComplaintCase.name: ComplaintCase
ComplaintCase.description: Represents the association between a public complaint and its corresponding case.

CaseId.description: The name of the case that is associated with the complaint.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The ID of the complaint being raised.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the complaint case record owner.
